definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc

sentences.english: The organization needs to understand its strengths and weaknesses, and find areas for quick returns.
sentences.chinese: 组织需要理解它的强项和弱项，找到快速回报的方法。

sentences.english: Certainly must have the guarantee regarding the strong point practice, by against is out of practice.
sentences.chinese: 当然对于强项的练习也要有所保证，以防手生。

sentences.english: German pillbox for 88mm gun located on strong point WN72.
sentences.chinese: 德国碉堡上的强项WN72位于88毫米枪。

sentences.english: Sometimes, my mother and I have even Gobang, that was my strong suit of the.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，我和妈妈还下五子棋，这可是我的强项了。

sentences.english: Object-oriented systems software troubleshooting is the strength of our team.
sentences.chinese: 面向对象型系统软件故障查询是本组的强项。

sentences.english: You should know what your strengths and weaknesses are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该知道你的强项和弱点是什么。

sentences.english: 'That's what he was strong at, convincing clients to spend their money, ' Mr. Duffy recalls.
sentences.chinese: 达菲回忆说，说服客户花钱是他的强项。

sentences.english: His strength lies in his perseverance.
sentences.chinese: 他的强项在于他的坚忍。

sentences.english: I accede time administration to be one of my key backbones.
sentences.chinese: 我以为时光治理是我的强项之一。

sentences.english: Each method of depiction has different strengths and weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 每种描述方法都有不同的强项和弱点。

sentences.english: Q: What are your most professional skills?
sentences.chinese: 你专业技能的强项是什么？

sentences.english: What are your communication strengths and weaknesses as a manager?
sentences.chinese: 作为管理者，你的交流强项以及弱项各是什么？

sentences.english: For Mr L?scher, this reflects the real strength of Siemens.
sentences.chinese: 在罗旭德看来，这反映了西门子真正的强项。

sentences.english: When you overcome your weakness, you can list it on your strength list.
sentences.chinese: 当你克服了你的弱点，就可以将它们列入强项里。

sentences.english: I'm not saying negatives are better. They have different strengths and weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 你的论点不够详细有力，表达不到负片的强项。

sentences.english: Rhode Island was especially strong in textile manufacturing.
sentences.chinese: 罗德岛州的强项是纺织业。

definition: to be good at/to be expert in
personal strength/one's special ability or strong points
to be good at sth/one's forte
to be intensely proud of sth (idiom)
main assault/to focus on/to specialize in/to major in
to foster strengths and avoid weaknesses (idiom)/to play to one's strengths
reckoned to be first or second best (idiom)/one of the very best/to list one by one
